TaskWhoRelation.name: TaskWhoRelation
TaskWhoRelation.description: Represents the relationship between a task and a lead or contacts.

AccountId.description: Indicates the Account ID of the relation. For information on IDs, see ID Field Type.

RelationId.description: Indicates the ID of the contacts or lead related to the task.

TaskId.description: Indicates the ID of the task.

Type.description: Indicates whether the person related to the task is a lead or contact.
